abilities.title: My friends make the impossible possible
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose another allied Rebel Alliance character. The chosen character may . Then, if the chosen character is Spectre , it may gain . I'm gonna go add some fireworks to the celebration One character in this Unit may choose an objective within 4 and roll 5 Attack Dice. Each Unit within 2 of that objective suffers for each [expertise] result in the roll. Then one character in this Unit may . I forged this armor with my family After this Unit makes a move action, it may use this ability. If a character in this Unit is within 2 of another allied Mandalorian character or another allied Spectre character, this Unit immediately makes a focus action.
